body_html:
So, some of the tests check for certain calls giving errors. As you said in (1).
But on PPC64, for some reason our c++ exception catcher (that catches exceptions and translates them into python error) is not working, and the whole process is fatal exiting.
body_text:
So, some of the tests check for certain calls giving errors. As you said in (1).
But on PPC64, for some reason our c++ exception catcher (that catches exceptions and translates them into python error) is not working, and the whole process is fatal exiting.
body:
So, some of the tests check for certain calls giving errors. As you said in (1).
But on PPC64, for some reason our c++ exception catcher (that catches exceptions and translates them into python error) is not working, and the whole process is fatal exiting.
